welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Wolnzach, a charming Bavarian town known for its rich history and delicious hops! We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all the beauty and culture this city has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ingolstadt-manching Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Ingolstadt-manching Airport, mainly used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Franz Josef Strauss Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The secondary terminal at Franz Josef Strauss Airport, primarily serving low-cost and regional airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require registration and have time limits.
